recipes.title: Pasta with Tomato Cream Sauce
instructions: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add flour and cook, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Gradually add milk and cream, stirring constantly.
Cook and stir until mixture is thickened and bubbly.
Stir in tomato sauce and cheeses.
Cook and stir until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
ingredients: 2 lbs. Grass Fed Stew Meat, Cut into 1” Cubes
Sea Salt and Pepper to Taste
instructions: Heat the avocado oil in a skillet.
Add the meat and cook on medium/low heat until edges are browned.
Place meat in a slow cooker.
Add salt and pepper, and stir to coat.
Add remaining ingredients and stir to mix.
Cover and cook on LOW 8-10 hours (or HIGH 4-5 hours).
